What a Great Joint!!! Organic food top to bottom at 0 kilometers in full respect of Mother Nature. right in the hearth of Barcelona Ramblas.We stumbled upon Rebelot by pure coincidence, right from the getGo,the nice ambiance and  the aroma form  the kitchen got me going :)The Host Kikko suggested the perfect Tapas matched with the perfect WinesReally felt had a slice of the  real local "comida" have to admit try most of the menu and LOVED IT!!!!!Gonna be back everytime i come back to Barcelona.
